common.extendedDescription: Optimize your website performance by reducing your file sizes by 30 to 70% on average. This advanced minification, unminification and beautification tool processes JavaScript, CSS and JSON in real-time, without compromising your data security. Perfect for developers, web agencies and businesses looking to improve their SEO and user experience.

performance.title: Performance Impact
performance.description: Minification significantly reduces your file sizes, speeding up your web page loading. A 30-70% reduction in file size translates to faster loading times and better user experience.

seo.title: SEO and Economic Benefits
seo.description: Search engines favor fast sites. Minification improves your SEO ranking while reducing bandwidth consumption, generating substantial savings on your hosting costs.

whyMinify.title: What is JavaScript and CSS code minification?
whyMinify.subtitle: JavaScript and CSS code minification is the process of removing unnecessary characters from source code without changing its functionality. This includes whitespace, comments, and shortening variable names to optimize web performance.
whyMinify.detailedExplanation: In modern web development, every millisecond counts. Minification transforms your readable code into an optimized version that loads faster, consumes less bandwidth, and improves user experience. It's an essential practice for high-traffic sites, web applications, and e-commerce projects where performance directly impacts conversions.

performance.title: File size reduction
performance.description: Minification can reduce JavaScript and CSS file sizes by 30-70%, significantly improving page load times. This optimization is particularly crucial for mobile sites and slow connections, where every kilobyte saved matters.

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth optimization
bandwidth.description: Smaller files mean less data transfer, reducing bandwidth costs and improving user experience on slower connections. For a site with 10,000 daily visitors, this can represent substantial hosting cost savings.

security.title: Code obfuscation
security.description: Minified code is harder to read and reverse-engineer, providing a basic level of code protection. While not absolute security, it discourages attempts at copying or malicious modification.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Our minification tool is designed to be simple, fast and secure.

paste.title: Paste your code
paste.description: Copy and paste your code into the left editor. Our automatic detection recognizes the language.

configure.title: Configure options
configure.description: Customize minification according to your needs: compatibility, compression, optimizations.

getResult.title: Get the result
getResult.description: Your minified code appears instantly. Download or copy the result.

seoOptimization.title: SEO and Performance Optimization
seoOptimization.subtitle: Code minification directly improves your search engine ranking and your site's user experience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about code minification.

questions.question: Does minification break my code?
questions.answer: No, minification only changes the code presentation (spaces, comments, variable names) without altering its functionality. Your code works exactly the same way.

questions.question: Can I unminify minified code?
questions.answer: Yes, this tool can unminify JavaScript and CSS minified code, although the result may not always be identical to the original code (comments and variable names are lost).

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All processing happens client-side in your browser. No data is sent to servers, ensuring complete privacy.

questions.question: What file types can I minify?
questions.answer: This tool supports JavaScript, CSS and JSON for minification, as well as PHP serialization. Each file type has its own optimization options for maximum results.

questions.question: Does minification really improve performance?
questions.answer: Yes, minification can reduce file sizes by 30 to 70%, resulting in faster loading times and better user experience.

questions.question: Is the tool really free?
questions.answer: Yes, Fast Minify is 100% free and requires no registration. You can use it as much as you want without any limitations.

codeExamples.title: Minification examples
codeExamples.subtitle: Discover how minification transforms your code to optimize performance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: FastMinify Privacy Policy - How we handle your data

introduction.title: Data Processing
introduction.content: FastMinify processes your code locally in your browser. No code is stored, collected, or transmitted to servers. This tool is designed to be completely private and secure.

dataCollection.title: What Is Collected
dataCollection.content: The site only collects anonymous usage data through:

types.analytics: Google Analytics (with your consent) - anonymous traffic statistics
types.cookies: Essential cookies for language preferences and functionality
types.ads: Advertising data via Google AdSense (no personal data collected)

types.title: Cookie types:
types.essential: Essential cookies for site functionality (always active)

retention.title: Retention period:
retention.essential: Essential cookies: session or 1 year maximum

googleServices.title: Third-Party Services
googleServices.analytics: Google Analytics: Anonymous traffic statistics (you can opt-out)
googleServices.adsense: Google AdSense: Displays advertisements (no personal data collected)

dataRights.title: Your Rights
dataRights.content: Since we don't store personal data, you can:

rights.optout: Opt-out of Google Analytics at any time
rights.cookies: Manage cookie preferences in your browser

dataSecurity.title: Security
dataSecurity.content: Your code is processed entirely in your browser and never sent to our servers. No data is stored or transmitted.

dataTransfers.title: Data transfers outside the EU
dataTransfers.content: Some of our third-party services may transfer data to countries located outside the European Union:

transfers.purpose: These transfers are necessary for the operation of our analytics and advertising services.

safeguards.title: Legal safeguards:
safeguards.adequacy: European Commission adequacy decision regarding the United States
safeguards.contractual: Standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission

rights.title: Your rights:
rights.object: You can object to these transfers by disabling analytics cookies
rights.information: You can request information about the safeguards in place
rights.complaint: You can lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority

privacy.footer: This privacy policy may be updated. Check back periodically for changes.
